name: Oh Snap!
description:
As a peaceful snapping turtle, being locked in an enclosure can be extremely frustrating, and being touched by children all day doesn't make it any better. Let your anger be known by biting kids as they try and invade your personal bubble, but don't get caught by the zookeeper else you might find yourself in hot water!

Credits:

Adnan Patel - Art

Alexander Bakos - Game Design

Justin Kuo - Programming

Kelly Simon - Art / UI

Mark Tangalin - Game Design / Sound
